  index: "swedish_example",
  settings: {
    analysis: {
      filter: {
        swedish_stop: {
          type: "stop",
          stopwords: "_swedish_",
        },
        swedish_keywords: {
          type: "keyword_marker",
          keywords: ["exempel"],
        },
        swedish_stemmer: {
          type: "stemmer",
          language: "swedish",
        },
      },
      analyzer: {
        rebuilt_swedish: {
          tokenizer: "standard",
          filter: [
            "lowercase",
            "swedish_stop",
            "swedish_keywords",
            "swedish_stemmer",
          ],
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
